title: The Godfather
description: Crime saga about power, family, and loyalty. Masterclass in filmmaking.

title: Casablanca

description: Violent, funny, nonlinear storytelling that reshaped ‘90s cinema.

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
description: Visually unmatched sci-fi epic. Philosophical and hypnotic.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Prison escape drama that hits every emotional beat perfectly.

title: The Godfather Part II
description: A rare sequel that deepens the original. Parallel stories done right.

title: Star Wars: A New Hope
description: The blockbuster that started it all. Space opera meets myth.

description: Climactic, emotionally massive conclusion to the fantasy trilogy.

title: Apocalypse Now
description: A nightmarish journey into war and human darkness.

description: Hard-boiled detective story with a bleak, unforgettable ending.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Grounded superhero film that plays like a crime thriller.

description: Deeper, darker, and better than the original.

description: Reality-bending sci-fi that blew minds and redefined action.

description: Historical romance meets disaster epic. Massive scale, massive success.

description: Rebellion, control, and insanity in one of Nicholson’s best.

description: Samurai epic that laid the groundwork for modern action films.

description: Serial killer thriller with unforgettable performances.

description: Obsession, illusion, and vertigo — Hitchcock’s most complex film.

description: Wild, operatic story of Mozart’s genius and madness.

description: Intense, obsessive pursuit of greatness. Painful and electric.

description: Brazilian crime drama that hits hard and never lets up.

description: Alt-history revenge fantasy with Tarantino’s sharpest edge.

description: Love, loss, and memory in one of the most original modern romances.

description: Addiction spiral filmed like a waking nightmare.

title: The Lion King
description: Shakespearean tragedy dressed as Disney animation. Iconic soundtrack.

description: Facebook’s origin story told like a courtroom thriller.
